name: PileUp! Candymania FREE
description:
Enjoy a sugar rush of fun in the fantastically FREE PileUp! Candymania!

---------------------------------------

The long awaited sequel of the online hit PC game, PileUp!, is finally here! Now you can head off to candy cosmos and give your iPhone or iPod Touch a real treat!

Clear 60 levels of increasingly difficult, sugar-fueled fun in 6 different environments. Drop sets of three candy pieces onto a pile and match colors to make the candies vanish. The game's realistic physics makes candies drop and bump into each other, adding an extra challenge to the exciting gameplay. Collect huge bonuses from consecutive matches and clear levels with the help of amazing power-ups.

Based on the hugely popular PC and Mac game from GameHouse, with over 30 million downloads.


---------------------------------------

Features:

* Hugely addictive and simple gameplay

* 60 levels of increasingly difficult sugar-fueled fun

* 6 different Candy themed environments

* Bonuses, power-ups, and other surprises help you on your way

---------------------------------------

We take pride in the loyalty and trust our customers show us when they purchase a GameHouse product. If you are not completely satisfied with your recent purchase, please contact us at iphone-games@real.com.
